channel.title: Bookmark on Bill's Tech Tips
channel.description: Recent content in Bookmark on Bill's Tech Tips

item.title: Invent-a-Word
item.description: https://www.degraeve.com/invent-a-word/ I like using this site to come up with creative names. It will combine the beginning or ending of a given word with other matching words in the dictionary. Example: travel + velocity = travelocity
